calc::Rle Class Reference

Documentation

This class implements Run length encoding and decoding algorithms.

static int calc::Rle::calc_size ( const void *  src,
int  nbyte 
)
static

Calculates the number of bytes that will be used by the compressed data.

Parameters
srcA pointer to the source memory
sizeThe number of bytes to process
Returns
The number of bytes the data would occupy after compression

ssize_t &  dest_size,
const void *  src,
ssize_t  src_size 
)
static

Decodes a block of data that has been run length encoded.

Parameters
destA pointer to the destination data
dest_sizePass the max size of dest, this will hold the number of decoded bytes upon return
srcA pointer to the encoded data
src_sizeThe number of encoded bytes to process
Returns
Number of encoded bytes that were processed

ssize_t &  dest_size,
const void *  src,
ssize_t  src_size 
)
static

Encodes a block of data using run length encoding.

Parameters
destA pointer to the destination data
dest_sizePass the max size of dest, this will hold the number of encoded bytes upon return
srcA pointer to the source data
src_sizeThe number of bytes to encode
Returns
Number of un-encoded bytes that were processed
